title: What’s Left Is Love – Trailer
content:
The Mid South 2025 was, quite literally, a disaster.

What began as a celebration of movement and community became a sudden race to safety as high winds sparked wildfires across the state.
In the chaos of the fires, a town and its people rallied—and the stories that emerged hold vital lessons for a future shaped by climate uncertainty.

Please join the Mid South Crew for a community screening of the feature documentary “What’s Left is Love” on Wednesday, May 14th, at 7 p.m. at the Stillwater Community Center. The screening is free and open to the public. After the screening, everyone will gather at Stonecloud for a social hour. All are welcome.

Coming May 14th 2025 to the Stillwater Community Center Theater
